H0.text: The flag of Libya is a plain rectangle of which color. Red

H1.text: The flag of Libya is a plain rectangle of which color. Blue

H2.text: The flag of Libya is a plain rectangle of which color. Yellow

H3.text: The flag of Libya is a plain rectangle of which color. Green

A4.text: The flag of Libya consists of a triband red-black-green design, with the central black band being twice the width of the outer bands.
